attributes.action: Get illegal immigration under control by making the Rwanda asylum scheme work.
attributes.additional_details: Dominic Raab bill of rights policy was part of the Conservative manifesto. and this is what the British people voted for so this bill must be put though parliament. people of this country want to see this broken immigration system fixed and put under control Almost 40,000 people have crossed the Channel in small boats so far in 2022. so proves this country has no control over illegal immigration so bring forward the bill of rights policy to parliament and make the Rwanda scheme work.
attributes.background: Make the Rwanda asylum scheme work amend the human rights act and replace it with a Bill of rights act to put an end of European court royal and entrench the primacy of British law over rulings from the ECHR. Dominic Raab bill of rights policy was part of the Conservative manifesto. So get it done.
